overview:
At Emerson Equity, we understand that nothing takes the place of a firm’s ability to deliver tangible results. That’s why each of our clients works directly with an investment professional who draws on the firm’s broad resources to tailor a specific financial program to fit their needs.

As a full-service brokerage firm, Emerson Equity was founded with the vision of providing individual investors with complete financial planning and highly personalized investment management services. Backed by one of Wall Street’s largest clearing firms, we offer an extensive array of products to meet your financial objectives, including: equities, bonds, options, mutual funds, CDs and retirement plans.

We are a member of the Financial Industry Regulatory Authority (FINRA), Municipal Securities Rulemaking Board (MSRB), and the Securities Investor Protection Corporation (SIPC). Emerson Equity is also a Registered Investment Advisor.

We also have an investment banking arm, and wealth management services.
